w :  hey mark  have you been able to sell your old piano yet ?
m :  oh  you were right  just posting notices on bulletin boards at a couple of supermarkets wasn ' t enough .  i think i have to place an advertisement in the local newspaper .

question: what does the man imply ?
choice: he decides not to sell the piano .
he ' s looking for a right piano .
no one has bought the piano .
answer: no one has bought the piano .
